name: Summer Rain (psycraft)
description:
UPDATE: V1.2 was uploaded before the end of submissions time, with a fixed frame rate and some minor corrections. V1.0 is hidden from downloads.

Project made for Epic Mega Gamejam 2019

How To Play:

- Tilt the umbrella with WASD or the gamepad's left analog.

- Press SPACE BAR or the gamepad's A button to close the umbrella and drop down.

- Pass through as many rings as you can.

- Finish the level by landing back on the umbrella's owner, marked by a target.

Music provided by musopen.org

Sound Effects provided by freesound.org

Human characters animations by Mixamo

Made with Maya LT and Unreal Engine.
